subject: RE: Eugene PD x Flock - clean contract

body:
Hi Caroline,

 

Thanks for taking my call last Friday, we will await the finalized order form to include in the contract.

 

Insurance � Would you please request a COI with the City of Eugene named? Thank you!

 

Contract Process: As discussed, since this is a City contract, we request that Flock is the first signor. Once Flock signs, please return a copy to Nikki and I, and we will route for signatures on the City�s side through our internal process. Once countersigned, we will return the fully executed copy to you, setup a PO, and send billing instructions. 

 

Once we have the final order form, I�ll coordinate further with you if we have any final details or questions. We look forward to have this wrapped up soon!

 

Thank you for your collaboration on this.

 

Best,

 

Tim Costin

Sr. Financial Analyst

Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401

Office: (541) 682-8364

Cell: (541) 844-9015

 



 

 

 

 

 

 

From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com> 
Sent: Thursday, March 13, 2025 2:47 PM
To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov>; COSTIN Timothy M <TCostin@eugene-or.gov>; CHOTERUNGRUANGKORN Nikki <NChoterungruangkorn@eugene-or.gov>; KANNEN Mark R <MKannen@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: Eugene PD x Flock - clean contract

 

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi all, 


Thank you again for your time today. I have attached the 2 clean documents, as well as our W9 and COI. If you'd like the City of Eugene to be named on the COI, please let me know.

 

Captain Burke and I are finalizing a few camera locations, and then I will be able to generate the final order form, which will be included in the final document to be signed (The final cost will not exceed $174k/yr, as discussed).


Please let me know when you have confirmed the contract language is how it should be, so we can start the process to route the contract for signature. 

 

On that note, typically I route the contract for signature. First signer as Eugene City Manager, Second signer as Flock General Counsel Mark Smith. Will you please confirm the following: 

1. Are you ok with me being the one to route for signature via DocuSign?

2. Sarah Medary as Eugene CM and contract signer

3. Can Eugene sign first, or would you prefer Flock to?

 

Thank you!

	
 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/797ab319-793a-47f2-831d--com 

Caroline Fraher
Account Executive

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/797ab319-793a-47f2-831d-01eb3dd79b35/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGY2LONNSWI2LOFZRW63JPMNXW24DBNZ4S6ZTMN5RWWLLTMFTGK5DZ/HFQWIMRQGQ4WIODDGFTDSM3EHFRDAYRXGEYWEMBUMRSDQNJWHA4TANJZGAYGEY3C/www-linkedin-com-company-flock-safety
